name: Yahya Fadhilah
bio: Yahya (born May 4th, 2000) is the stage name of Yahya Fadhilah, an Indonesian singer-songwriter based in Bandung. His first introduction to music was at the age of 12 as an acoustic fingerstyle guitarist.

name: Pasha Qonia
bio: Pasha Qonia, a 20-year-old solo artist, brings the nostalgic vibes of 90s digital vintage pop to the modern music scene. Pasha's sound is a harmonious blend of past and present. Her evolving musical focus captures the essence of retro pop while infusing it with a contemporary twist. Join Pasha on her musical journey and relive the golden era of pop with every track.

name: Reby Chandra
bio: Reby Chandra is an emerging Indonesian artist who brings a fresh perspective to contemporary music. With a focus on heartfelt lyrics and melodic compositions, Reby creates music that resonates with listeners on a personal level.

name: Tania Salsabila
bio: Tania Salsabila is a talented vocalist and songwriter who brings emotional depth to her performances. Her music combines traditional Indonesian influences with contemporary production techniques.

name: Crescentials Record
bio: Crescentials Record represents the studio's own musical projects and collaborations. This encompasses various experimental tracks and showcase pieces that demonstrate the studio's production capabilities.
